item.title: Requirements
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded:
PageLines DMS has some system requirements you should be aware of prior to installing. Browser Requirements PageLines DMS has been designed to work best in the latest desktop and mobile browsers, meaning older browsers will likely not be compatible, as they do not support most CSS3 properies. Specifically, we support the latest versions of the following:
  • Chrome (Android, iOS, Mac and Windows)
  • Safari (iOS and Mac only, Windows has more or less been discontinued)
  • Firefox (Mac, Windows)
  • Internet Explorer
  • Opera (Mac, Windows)
[pl_alertbox type="info"]

Internet Explorer 8 and 9

Internet Explorer 8 and 9 are compatible. However, please be aware that many CSS3 properties are not supported by IE8 and therefore, support for IE8 is limited. [/pl_alertbox] To ensure you have a secure and enjoyable browsing experience, we recommend you visit Browse Happy. Browse Happy is a way for you to find out what is the latest version of each major browser. [pl_alertbox type="warning"]

DMS Visual Editor & Toolbar

PageLines DMS Visual Editor is only compatible with Google Chrome. The reason behind this is that Chrome has the best compiler and fastest javascript. Therefore if you wish to use the PageLines DMS Visual Editor, Google Chrome is required. [/pl_alertbox]

item.title: Scroll Spy
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
A navbar section which enables you to auto scroll to specific content within your page.
This section allows you to set specific anchor points within your page content which are connected to the scroll spy navbar. Once set, simply clicking a menu item in the scroll spy navbar will trigger the peg to jump from one section of your page to another instantly.

item.title: StarBars
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
Awesome animated stat bars that animate as the user scrolls.
With StarBars, you can show off stats or other gaugeable information.
Use StarBars to track your weight loss goals, report the amount of coffee you drink each day, show off how many amazing sites you have built using DMS2 the possibilities are endless!

item.title: Popshot
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
An animated image shelf that pops out your images when the user scrolls over them.
Popshot allows you to insert your images in a number of different ways to best suit your design. Additional options allow you to stack the images, add styling effects like drop shadow or frames all from within the visual editor of DMS.
This section has a selection of style and layout options to choose from and includes background video for multiple video formats and HTML5 video support.

item.title: Masonic Gallery
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
A robust gallery section that includes options for sorting.
Masonic Gallery comes in two formats, either as a full width section or as a self contained section that fits within the content of your site.
Display options include either a Grid Gallery or an masonry style format. This section supports custom post types and has tonnes of styling options.

item.title: RapidTabs
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
Displays your most popular, and latest posts as well as comments and tags in a tabbed format.
A preset section which allows users to interact further with your blog.
This section is ideal for placing within a sidebar and contains no section options, which makes it really easy to set up, simply drag and drop into position within the layout to get people viewing more pages in your blog roll.

item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
[gallery ids="1196,1187,1185,1186,1189"] DMS2 supports post formats and you're looking at the new gallery post format. It uses WordPress' native gallery function and renders it in a way your users can appreciate. Here is some filler text. Sound ok? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. item.title: Audio Post Format
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
Need to let your site be heard? PageLines Posts come with a custom audio player. Adding audio is easy:
  1. Upload the audio (.mp3, .ogg or .oga) you would like to be included in the player.
  2. Add the URL to the audio settings area.
  3. And thats it!
PageLines automatically pulls the .mp3 audio files from the gallery and inserts an audio player at the top of the post, Nice! Here is some filler text. Sound ok? item.title: Video Post Format (HTML5)
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:
DMS2 supports post formats and youre looking at the new video post format. Video is one of the most interesting features of HTML5. DMS allows you to incorporate native video in a post, and render it in a way your users will appreciate. Here is some filler text. Sound ok? item.title: Navi
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded:
A pre-styled navigation bar with multiple modes and styles.
Option for this section includes the ability to add your own custom logo, insert a background image or even background video via multiple video formats, including HTML5 video support.
This section also allows you to add a full width, multi column megamenu just by simply adding a custom class to the WordPress menu. Includes lots of styling options which can be configured directly via the DMS editor.

item.title: QuickCarousel
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded:
A fast way to create an animated image carousel.
Quick Carousel has limited options which makes it really easy to setup. This section comes as either a full width section or as a self contained section that fits within the content of your site.
When showcasing pictures, a user can either let the slide show run through the images or easily scroll through the thumbnails below. If a link is applied in the section options, clicking on an image will take you directly to a linked page or content. Simple.

item.title: Hero
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded:
A responsive, full width section with a simple headline and call to action.
The Intro Unit forces the focus of your visitors onto your featured content, and a call to action with a simple button that directs traffic to any destination.

item.title: Docker
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded:
A great way to display your product, your site support documentation or important information like terms and conditions in a structured and professional way.
The Docker section includes a fixed sidebar that easily allows you to select your content and is able to use any registered post type.
Full width & content width versions of Docker are included to best suit your layout and the section includes an array of style and layout options including background video with multiple video formats.

item.title: iCallout
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded:
Insert a quick call to action section which encourages your users to interact.
The iCallout Section is a quick way to direct your site visitors to a specific part of your page via an enticing visual experience which results in them engaging with your site.
Use this section to direct your users to a product purchase, download or to sign up for your blog/newsletter.

item.title: Welcome to DMS!
item.dc:creator: arpowers
item.content:encoded:
Hello and welcome to PageLines DMS! What is DMS you say? Well a DMS is a Design Management System for your website. More specifically, PageLines DMS is built on top of WordPress and is designed to give you some awesome advantages.

Why DMS?

DMS is designed to solve one of the biggest problems in website design: How do I build a beautiful, custom website without spending a ton of time & money learning to code, or hiring someone who can? It does this by leveraging the strengths of various methods for building websites.From Themes: It is designed to be plug-and-play, so you can have great design out of the box. From WYSIWYG Editors: It is built to be customizable with inline options and drag and drop editing. This means you don't have to code or deal with technical operations to edit and maintain your site.

Advantages

Through this approach, DMS will allow you to:
  • Build website faster with less frustration
  • Craft better looking websites, with more functionality
  • Build websites with less technical knowledge and overhead.
  • Evolve your site design through extension.
  • Manage a site without technical hassle (No FTP, deployment, editing code & filesystems.)

item.title: Drag + Drop Design
item.dc:creator: arpowers
item.content:encoded:
PageLines DMS is based on the concept of "drag and drop web design." This new concept in web design allows you -- for the first time -- to use drag and drop to build a professional website. DMS stands for Design Management System and it was created to allow you to professionally manage your site design with drag & drop and little to no coding.

How it works

To do this, DMS leverages a framework for pre-built modules of code called sections. Some examples of a section might be a feature slider or a carousel. These sections load all of their required functionality on demand, so the DMS system also enhances site organization and performance. Sections can be dragged around your pages with almost 100% flexibility. They are then configured using section specific settings. Youll find lots more on using sections in the following sections of this guide. If youd like to add new sections to your site, PageLines provides a special store available at www.pagelines.com/shop for you to purchase sections that you can upload to your site. This means your site can grow and evolve organically, something themes or editors cant do.

item.title: Built for Perfectionists
item.dc:creator: arpowers
item.content:encoded:
PageLines believes in paying attention to the details. And we build products for people that feel the same way. We think its important a product has integrity as well as aspiration; and we've built these values into DMS. PageLines DMS is based on these things:
  • Cutting edge technology,
  • Industry standards and best practices
  • Customer insight based on years of experience
  • User feedback and iteration

Pixel perfect

DMS is built on a grid system. This way you don't have to struggle with aligning things. The grid handles it for you. All the pre built sections come professionally designed down to the details. Therefore, there is no 'reinventing' the wheel, things should look great out of the box.

item.title: Introducing PageLines DMS
item.dc:creator: arpowers

item.title: The User Guide
item.dc:creator: arpowers
item.content:encoded:
Want to check out the DMS user guide to see what you're getting into?
Cool, happy to help! I'll tell you what we'll do, we'll embed it right here in this blog post for you to peruse.
<iframe class="scribd_iframe_embed" src="//www.scribd.com/embeds/213323278/content?start_page=1&view_mode=slideshow&access_key=key-1dzmy27btqjwamjd0dye&show_recommendations=false" data-auto-height="false" data-aspect-ratio="0.772922022279349" scrolling="no" id="doc_23351" width="100%" height="600" frameborder="0"></iframe>
Wasn't that fun?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Why don't we test out the comments system?
Test
Great, that works and looks great

item.title: Search, Social, and Local
item.dc:creator: arpowers
item.content:encoded:
[gallery ids="1272,1271,1286,1200"]
Search, Social, and local integration with your website is more important than ever. That's why DMS2 comes prepared. Not only prepared, ready to attack!
We're using the latest in APIs and practices to make your content uber-sharable and discoverable.
Do you have a local business? Then you're gonna love the stuff we're building in.
Social shares now use AJAX, no more of those lame social share buttons that always look bad. Now social sharing is fun and easy for your visitors.

item.title: Robert Brown
item.dc:creator: pagelines
item.content:encoded:

item.title: PageLines Single #2
item.dc:creator: raymond
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
